AclResources.description:
ATTENTION: Do not modify the order of this enum.
New resources should always be appended.

id.description: The ID of the reward content to modify.

type.description: The type of reward content to modify.

value.description: The value to apply. Its behavior depends on the operator.

start_time_sec.description: The start time when this reward modifier was activated.

end_time_sec.description: The time when this reward modifier will expire.

ActiveRewardModifier.description: A reward modifier that is currently active.

id.description: Identifier of the note. Empty to update existing note.

AddAccountNoteBody.description: Add a new note for the user.

join_request.description: Whether it is a join request.

token.title: A one-time token required to update the user for the first time

AddUserResponse.description: Response to create/invite a new user.

ApiEndpointDescriptor.title: API Explorer List of Endpoints response message

user_id.description: The console user id that performed the action.

username.description: The console user username that performed the action.

email.description: The console user email that performed the action.

resource.description: The resource the action was performed on.

entries.description: A list of audit log entries.

next_cursor.description: Cursor to fetch next page of results.

prev_cursor.description: Cursor to fetch prev page of results.

AuditLogUsersList.description: List of users that can be filtered in the audit logs.

AuthenticateLogoutRequest.description: Log out a session and invalidate a session token.

recovery_codes.title: An one-time code to configure the MFA mechanism

AuthenticateRequest.description: Authenticate a console user with username and password.

max_rolls.description: The number of weighted reward contents to select from among the possibilities.

total_weight.description:
The total weight that all weighted reward contents are calculated against. Auto calculated if set to 0 but can be
set to a higher value to introduce a chance of a "none" reward.

max_repeat_rolls.description: The maximum number of repeats of any given weighted reward.

to_mailbox_expiry_sec.description: If rewards will be sent to the claimant's reward mailbox rather than applied directly, and what its expiry will be.

team_reward.description: Rewards for the claimant's team, if any.

AvailableRewards.description: The available rewards and their probabilistic weights.

items.description: All possible items from this particular reward.

item_sets.description: All possible item sets from this particular reward.

currencies.description: All possible currencies from this particular reward.

energies.description: All possible energies from this particular reward.

energy_modifiers.description: All possible energy reward modifiers from this particular reward.

reward_modifiers.description: All reward modifiers from this particular reward.

weight.description: The weight of the reward contents.

AvailableRewardsContents.description: The reward contents for available rewards.

count.description: The possible count of the currency.
The possible count of the energy.

id.description: The ID of the energy to modify.

operator.description: The operator of the energy modifier.

value.description: The value of the energy modifier.

duration_sec.description: The possible duration of the modifier.

count.description: The possible count of the reward.

numeric_properties.description: The possible numeric properties of the reward.

string_properties.description: The possible string properties of the reward.

count.description: The number of items to draw from the set.

max_repeats.description: The number of repeat items that may be drawn from the set. Also includes the user's inventory.

set.description: Drawn items must exist in the intersection of these sets.

id.description: The ID of the reward item, currency, energy, or energy modifier to modify.

type.description: The type of reward content to modify.

duration_sec.description: The possible duration of the modifier.

total_weight.description: The total weight from which the options are selected.

max_rolls.description: The number of weighted reward contents to select from among the possibilities.

total_weight.description:
The total weight that all weighted reward contents are calculated against. Auto calculated if set to 0 but can be
set to a higher value to introduce a chance of a "none" reward.

max_repeat_rolls.description: The maximum number of repeats of any given weighted reward.

AvailableTeamMemberRewards.description: Available rewards for each member of a team.

max_rolls.description: The number of weighted reward contents to select from among the possibilities.

total_weight.description:
The total weight that all weighted reward contents are calculated against. Auto calculated if set to 0 but can be
set to a higher value to introduce a chance of a "none" reward.

max_repeat_rolls.description: The maximum number of repeats of any given weighted reward.

to_mailbox_expiry_sec.description: If rewards will be sent to the claimant's reward mailbox rather than applied directly, and what its expiry will be.

member_reward.description: Reward to be granted to all individual team members.

AvailableTeamRewards.description: Available rewards for the claimant's team.

items.description: All possible items from this particular reward.

item_sets.description: All possible item sets from this particular reward.

currencies.description: All possible currencies from this particular reward.

reward_modifiers.description: All reward modifiers from this particular reward.

weight.description: The weight of the reward contents.

AvailableTeamRewardsContents.description: The reward contents for available team rewards.

CallApiEndpointBody.title: API Explorer request definition for CallApiEndpoint

CallApiEndpointResponse.title: API Explorer response definition for CallApiEndpoint

CallRpcEndpointBody.title: API Explorer request definition for CallApiEndpoint

channel_id.description: The channel this message belongs to.

message_id.description: The unique ID of this message.

code.description: The code representing a message type or category.

sender_id.description: Message sender, usually a user ID.

username.description: The username of the message sender, if any.

create_time.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the message was created.

update_time.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the message was last updated.

persistent.description: True if the message was persisted to the channel's history, false otherwise.

room_name.description: The name of the chat room, or an empty string if this message was not sent through a chat room.

group_id.description: The ID of the group, or an empty string if this message was not sent through a group channel.

user_id_one.description: The ID of the first DM user, or an empty string if this message was not sent through a DM chat.

user_id_two.description: The ID of the second DM user, or an empty string if this message was not sent through a DM chat.

ChannelMessage.description: A message sent on a channel.

next_cursor.description: The cursor to send when retrieving the next page, if any.

prev_cursor.description: The cursor to send when retrieving the previous page, if any.

cacheable_cursor.description: Cacheable cursor to list newer messages. Durable and designed to be stored, unlike next/prev cursors.

ChannelMessageList.description: A list of channel messages, usually a result of a list operation.

warnings.description: Any warnings about the current config.

Config.description: The current server configuration and any associated warnings.

Console.WriteStorageObjectBody.description: Write a new storage object or update an existing one.

token.description: A session token (JWT) for the console user.

mfa_code.description: MFA code required to setup the MFA mechanism.

active_reward_modifiers.description: Updated active reward modifiers, if changed.

EconomyUpdateAck.description:
Response from granting currencies, reward modifiers, and/or items.
Contains updated wallet and inventory data, if changed.
Contains reward granted, if any.
Contains active reward modifiers, if changed.

refill.description: Amount of energy granted per refill.

next_refill_time_sec.description: The UNIX timestamp when the count will increase, if it is not at max already.

max_refill_time_sec.description: The UNIX timestamp when the count will reach max, if it is not at max already.

start_refill_time_sec.description: The UNIX timestamp when the count started filling, if it is not at max already.

current_time_sec.description: The current UNIX timestamp in seconds.

Energy.description: Information about a single energy type.

energies.description: Energy types keyed on the energy identifier.

EnergyList.description: One or more energy values for a user.

start_time_sec.description: The UNIX timestamp when the modifier became active.

end_time_sec.description: The UNIX timestamp when the modifier ends.

EnergyModifier.description: A modifier that may change energy behaviour.

update_time.description: Time of the latest relationship update.

cursor.description: Cursor for the next page of results, if any.

FriendList.description: A collection of zero or more friends of the user.

creator_id.description: The id of the user who created the group.

name.description: The unique name of the group.

lang_tag.description: The language expected to be a tag which follows the BCP-47 spec.

metadata.description: Additional information stored as a JSON object.

avatar_url.description: A URL for an avatar image.

open.description: Anyone can join open groups, otherwise only admins can accept members.

edge_count.description: The current count of all members in the group.

max_count.description: The maximum number of members allowed.

create_time.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the group was created.

update_time.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the group was last updated.

GroupExport.description: An export of all information stored for a group.

cursor.description: Cursor for the next page of results, if any.

GroupUserList.description: A list of users belonging to a group, along with their role.

ignore_limits.description: Whether to ignore limits when granting items.

HiroAddUserInventoryItemsBody.description: Represents a request to grant items to the user.

HiroEconomyGrantBody.description: Request to modify a user's economy wallet.

HiroEnergyGrantBody.description: Request to update a user's energy.

HiroPurchaseProgressionsBody.description: Request to purchase a progression for a user.

HiroStatsUpdateBody.description: Request to update a user's stats.

HiroUnlockProgressionsBody.description: Request to unlock one or more progressions for a user.

counts.description: Counts to apply to the progression.

HiroUpdateProgressionsBody.description: Request to update a progression for a user.

item_updates.description: The item updates to action, keyed by item instance ID.

data.description: The export data snapshot to import.

ImportAccountBody.description: Request to import user account data.

items.description: The items in the player's inventory.

Inventory.description: The inventory in the economy or owned by user.

name.description: The name of the item. May be an i18n code.

description.description: A description of the item. May be an i18n code.

category.description: The category to group the item together with others.

item_sets.description: The sets the item is grouped into.

count.description: The current count of the item.

max_count.description: The maximum count which can be owned for this item.

stackable.description: Whether or not the item is stackable.

consumable.description: Whether or not the item is consumable.

consume_available_rewards.description: The configuration for the reward to grant for consumption.

owned_time_sec.description: A UNIX timestamp when the user acquired this item.

update_time_sec.description: A UNIX timestamp when the item was updated.

instance_id.description: The instance ID of the item, if any.

InventoryItem.description: A item owned by the current user.

items.description: The inventory items from definitions and the user.

InventoryList.description: Response for retrieving Inventory system data definitions.

InventoryUpdateAck.description: Response from granting or purchasing items. This contains updated inventory data, if changed.

InventoryUpdateItemProperties.description: The typed properties to update in an instanced inventory item.

leaderboard_id.description: The ID of the leaderboard this score belongs to.

owner_id.description: The ID of the score owner, usually a user or group.

username.description: The username of the score owner, if the owner is a user.

num_score.description: The number of submissions to this score record.

create_time.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the leaderboard record was created.

update_time.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the leaderboard record was updated.

expiry_time.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the leaderboard record expires.

max_num_score.description: The maximum number of score updates allowed by the owner.

LeaderboardRecord.description: Represents a complete leaderboard record with all scores and associated metadata.

owner_records.description: A batched set of leaderboard records belonging to specified owners.

next_cursor.description: The cursor to send when retrieving the next page, if any.

prev_cursor.description: The cursor to send when retrieving the previous page, if any.

rank_count.description: The total number of ranks available.

LeaderboardRecordList.description: A set of leaderboard records, may be part of a leaderboard records page or a batch of individual records.

cursor.description: Cursor for retrieving the next page, if any.

NullValue.description:
`NullValue` is a singleton enumeration to represent the null value for the
`Value` type union.

The JSON representation for `NullValue` is JSON `null`.

 - NULL_VALUE: Null value.

Permissions.description: The possible actions that can done over a resource.

name.description: The name of the progression. May be an i18n code.

description.description: A description of the progression. May be an i18n code.

category.description: The category to group the progression together with others.

unconditional_updates.description: Flag indicating if unconditional updates are allowed.

permanent_unlock.description: Flag indicating if the progression remains unlocked permanently once unlocked the first time.

Progression.description: A progression element which can be unlocked to access further progressions.

items.description: The items which will be deducted.

currencies.description: The currencies which will be deducted.

ProgressionCost.description: The cost(s) associated with permanently unlocking a progression.

ProgressionDelta.description: A change in a given progression, compared to a previously known state.

ProgressionDeltaState.description:
- PROGRESSION_DELTA_STATE_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified. Defaults to UNCHANGED.
 - PROGRESSION_DELTA_STATE_UNCHANGED: Progression unlock state has not changed.
 - PROGRESSION_DELTA_STATE_UNLOCKED: Progression was locked, it is now unlocked.
 - PROGRESSION_DELTA_STATE_LOCKED: Progression was unlocked, it is now locked.

deltas.description: Progression deltas keyed by progression ID.

ProgressionList.description: All or a filtered list of progressions for a user.

nested.description: Nested block of preconditions, if any.

ProgressionPreconditionsBlock.description: A complex set of progression preconditions.

ProgressionPreconditionsOperator.description:
- PROGRESSION_PRECONDITIONS_OPERATOR_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified. Defaults to AND.
 - PROGRESSION_PRECONDITIONS_OPERATOR_AND: Both the direct preconditions and the nested block must be true.
 - PROGRESSION_PRECONDITIONS_OPERATOR_OR: Either the direct preconditions or the nested block must be true.
 - PROGRESSION_PRECONDITIONS_OPERATOR_XOR: Either the direct preconditions or the nested block must be true, but not both.
 - PROGRESSION_PRECONDITIONS_OPERATOR_NOT: The direct preconditions must be true, but the nested block must not be.

cursor.description: The cursor to send when retrieving the next page, if any.

prev_cursor.description: The cursor to send when retrieving the previous page, if any.

PurchaseList.description: A list of validated purchases stored by Nakama.

RegisteredSystems.description: Whether Hiro is registered and which systems are enabled.

public.description: Indicator if this belongs to public or private stats.

Stat.description: A single stat with associated information.

public.description: Public stat names and their associated data.

private.description: Private stat names and their associated data.

StatList.description: A list of stats all belonging to one user.

StatUpdateOperator.description:
Indicate how a stats update should be handled.

 - STAT_UPDATE_OPERATOR_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified. Defaults to Set.
 - STAT_UPDATE_OPERATOR_SET: Set the given value, overwriting any previous one.
 - STAT_UPDATE_OPERATOR_DELTA: Increment or decrement the existing value by the given amount. Equivalent to Set if no previous value existed.
 - STAT_UPDATE_OPERATOR_MIN: Use the new value if it's lower than the existing one. Equivalent to Set if no previous value existed.
 - STAT_UPDATE_OPERATOR_MAX: Use the new value if it's higher than the existing one. Equivalent to Set if no previous value existed.
